licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original statements.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in the Name Card unless explicitly provided and safe.
safety: Do not overwrite an existing Name Card file.

acceptance_criteria: Creates a Name Card markdown file at runtime/contexts/<context>/design/names/<id>.md.
The Name Card includes the provided id, label, context, and mds.
If the target file already exists, the skill exits with an error.

input_fixture.label: Example Concept
input_fixture.mds: A concept used to demonstrate Name Card minting.

input_fixture.label: Bounded Context
input_fixture.mds: A boundary within which a specific domain model is defined and consistent.

failure_modes: Missing or invalid required inputs (context, id, label, mds).
Target directory runtime/contexts/<context>/design/names is not accessible.
Failed to write Name Card file.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context>/design/names.
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Kebab-case technical id for the Name Card.
inputs.name: id

inputs.description: Plain-English label for the Name Card.
inputs.name: label

inputs.description: Minimal definitional statement for the concept.
inputs.name: mds

intent.goal: Mint a new F.18 Name Card for a concept within a bounded context.
non_goals: Does not edit or rename existing Name Cards.
Does not infer definitions beyond the provided MDS.

name: Mint Name

outputs.description: Path to the generated Name Card markdown file under runtime/contexts.
outputs.name: name_card_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs: context, id, label, mds.
Resolve runtime/contexts/<context>/design/names and ensure it exists.
Construct the Name Card markdown content using the provided inputs.
Write the Name Card file to runtime/contexts/<context>/design/names/<id>.md and fail if it already exists.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the mint action with spec F.18.

summary: Mints a new F.18 Name Card with strict Twin-Label and Sense-Seed validation.
